name: mcp-engineer
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) engineering plugin for architecting, developing, testing, and deploying MCP servers and clients in Python and TypeScript
author: Eric Austin <e@plsr.io>

agents.name: mcp-orchestrator
agents.description: Main orchestrator for coordinating MCP development tasks across specialized agents

agents.name: mcp-server-architect
agents.description: Designs MCP server architecture including tools, resources, and prompts

agents.name: mcp-client-architect
agents.description: Designs MCP client architecture for integrating with MCP servers

agents.name: mcp-python-developer
agents.description: Develops MCP servers and clients in Python using FastMCP and official SDK (Python 3.11+)

agents.name: mcp-typescript-developer
agents.description: Develops MCP servers and clients in TypeScript using official @modelcontextprotocol/sdk

agents.name: mcp-testing-engineer
agents.description: Tests MCP servers and clients with unit tests and MCP Inspector integration

agents.name: mcp-deployment-engineer
agents.description: Handles deployment of MCP servers for local installations and Docker containers

agents.name: mcp-security-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews MCP servers and clients for security vulnerabilities and best practices

commands.name: mcp-init-project
commands.description: Initialize new MCP server or client project

commands.name: develop-mcp-server
commands.description: Develop MCP server with tools, resources, and prompts

commands.name: develop-mcp-client
commands.description: Develop MCP client for integration with MCP servers

commands.name: test-mcp
commands.description: Test MCP server or client functionality

commands.name: review-mcp-security
commands.description: Security review of MCP server or client

commands.name: deploy-mcp
commands.description: Deploy MCP server locally or with Docker
